entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023
